name: USB to GPIB NI Compatibility Layer

screenshots.caption: USB GPIB VIs having been substituted into multimeter driver

short_description: Compatibility library/layer for USB (serial-type) to GPIB interface (currently FT245 chip only), a C-based library with Linux-GPIB and NI-type library calls such as ibrd() and ibwrt(). Includes LabView VIs modeled on those in the standard 488 interface l
